version_description: Official release version 1.1.1
Official release version 1.1.5
Official release version 1.1.6
Official release version 1.1.7
Fix bugs, optimize performance
Rebalance levels, change difficulty, achievement system added

- Worldwide leaderboard fixed
- Rebalance all the levels
- Added some enemies and waves
Fix bugs, rebalance levels, evolve 4th of all ships updated

- Focused epic ship part appears more often in supply boxes.
- Opening 5x boxes now guarantees at least 1 focused ship part.
- More detailed supply boxes description.
- Power up timer now pause when there's no enemy on screen.
- Campaign mode: change the 3rd star condition
- Endless mode: reduce starting wave for higher ship power
- Add ship evolution descriptions.
- Fix some bugs that cause data lost, IAP, & ads issues.

- Add Inventory system
- Add Campaign Hard mode level 17-24
- Add Campaign Hard mode level 25-32
- Add a new mini boss
- Various bugs fixed

- 8 new Campaign levels & a new boss
- 8 new Campaign hard mode levels
- Misc bug fixes & improvements
Update the Ads SDK and fix bugs
- Fix some crashes

- Add tutorial system
- Fix push notification
- Changes to level 25-32
- Change to supply box to reduce very bad luck cases.

- New feature: Campaign Hard mode
- New feature: Drone system
- Various UI, supply box & achievement changes to accomodate new features
- Change Endless mode HP scaling
- Improve campaign level 33-40
- Small balance changes

- New feature: Campaign Hard mode
- New feature: Drone system
- Various UI, supply box & achievement changes to accommodate new features
- Change Endless mode HP scaling
- Improve campaign level 33-40
- Small balance changes

- 8 new Campaign levels & a new boss
- 8 new Campaign hard mode levels
- Misc bug fixes & improvements

- Add Campaign Hard mode level 33-40
- Add 4th tier Pilot skills
- Add 2 new mini bosses

- Add level 105-112
- Changes to level 1
- Add help sections
- Some changes to shop system
- Fix & improve pilot skill tier 4 Shield
- Fix boss Vision idle bug
- Fix Corvus missing shurikens
- Fix ship & drone upgrade bug
- Fix various shield bugs

- Revive now cost 1-2-3-4 extra lives, down from 1-2-4-8
- Fix supply shop item. Extra lives, pilot training card and supply box now appear more often.
- Some improvements to the save system
- Improvements to some bosses
- Changes to damage formula, resulting in slight damage increase in earlier level
- Fix negative drone parts bug
- Fix seeking missile bug in certain level.
- Fix slow start up time in certain situation
- Fix some ads bugs.

- Improve the data sync system
- Add new boss Coleo for level 48
- Add level 41-56 hard mode
- Reduce the difficulty of earlier levels

- Add more localization
- Balance Endless mode
- Fix some bugs

Ships:
- Add 5th evolution for ships & drones
- Reduce ship & drone gold upgrade and evolution cost
- Improve ship control responsiveness
- Increase Shield 4 pilot skill radius
- Fix some Tempest bugs. It's cool now.

Levels:
- Add campaign level 113-120
- Add campaign (hard) level 57-72
- Reduce campaign mode difficulty

Levels:
- Add campaign level 121-128
- Add hard mode level 73-88
- Rebalance some levels & bosses

Others:
- Add Wingman item
- Add new pilot skills
- Fix some bugs
- Fix some issues.

- Add some minor improvements
- Fix some issues

New event: Operation: Christmas

Ship:
- Rework all evolutions
- Add 6th evolution for all ships & drones
- Reduce evolutions cost
- Rework Gun upgrade power-up

Level:
- Add campaign level 128-136
- Add hard mode level 89-96
- Add a new boss & mini boss

Shop:
- New weekly & monthly crystal promotion

Bug fixes:
- Fix ads issue
- Fix some waves not working
- Fix Supply Shop reset crystal cost
- Fix Unknown country bug on the leaderboard
Fix some bugs
Fix some bugs
- Fix some bugs.
- Fix even more bugs
- Fix even more bugs

- Add 8 new campaign levels & new boss Dark Tempest
- Add 8 new hard mode levels & boss Angel (hard)
- Add 4 new elite enemies
- Fix some bugs

- Add 8 new campaign levels & a new boss
- Improve boss Dark Tempest
- Fix a bug that causes players to lose progresses
- Fix a bug that causes unfinished ships to appear

- Fix some ad issues
- Better notification & timers
- Screen aspect ratio for longer & wider devices
- Fix some server issues
- Nav bar is easier to click now
- A certain boss name change

- Add 4 new ships: Phoenix, Manta, Ifrit, Frigus
- Add a new boss: Dark Cryo
- Add hard mode for The Core & Dark Corvus
Update new drones
Update new drones

New features:
- New skin system. New shiny skins for your ships!
- New inbox system.
- A new event is coming soon...

Ships & Drones:
- Add 2nd evolution for legendary ships & drones
- Some improvements to make Manta easier to use
- Fix Vespa & Hornet drones hitting less than 3 times

Enemies:
- Add 8 new campaign levels & hard mode
- Add new mob behaviors

Misc:
- Inventory part conversion ratio has been buffed
- Fix some crystal ads quest bugs
- Fix some bugs

- Add a new evolution for legendary ships & drones
- Redesign Endless mode

Levels:
- Add 8 new campaign & hard mode levels
- Reduce common enemies' HP
- Improve elite mobs's behaviors

Gold income:
- Moving endless mode gold reward to various places in the game
- Gold reward now scale with the player's ships & drones level

Others:
- Redesign Quests section
- Career missions now replaces the Achievement section
- Many video ads changed to a reward wheel

- Add a new evolution for legendary ships & drones
- Redesign Endless mode

- Rebalance bosses HP & attack pattern

Endless mode:
- Rearrange bosses in Endless mode
- Fix Endless 2x gold appearing less than intended
- Fix Endless bonus item issue
- Fix Subscription gold bonus in Endless mode

Bug fixes:
- Improve occasional lag/micro freeze issue
- Fix Proximo secondary weapon issue
- Other miscellaneous bugs

- Fix a critical bug that cause data loss

- Rebalance bosses HP & attack pattern

Level:
- Add 8 levels campaign & new boss
- Add 8 levels hard mode & new hard boss

Endless mode:
- Lower mob HP, especially in later waves
- Increase the gold dropped
- Fix a bug that affects the x2 gold bonus

VIP System:
- Gain VIP point with in-app purchases
- Gaining new VIP rank awards various bonus, from free gold and crystal, to exclusive Dark skin, and wings for your ships!

Shop: Add Dynamic Gold Pack

Localize: Add many Career mission localizations

Ships:
- Add 4th evolution for Legendary Ships & Drones

Others:
- Add content for a future event
- Misc bug fixes
- Various UI improvements

New Consumables:
- Super Reflex: Slowing time down for a while
- Drone Swarm: Summon your other drones to attack enemies

Boosters:
- Can now be used multiple time mid-game while reviving
- Now grant effect equal to a standard Shield/Gun/Overload power up
- Cost changed to crystals

Others:
- Endless mode: highest wave record reset
- Many bug fixes and minor improvements

- Add new content for Christmas event
- Fix some bugs

New content for Christmas event:
- Skins: Sled Fizard, Neon Star Corvus, Pine Valiant, Neon Star Wing
- New event ships: Helios & Hyperion

- New levels to 208 & boss Dark Proximo
- Boosters revert to old price & functionality

- Increase the Gold amount in Supply Shop Ads & Dynamic Gold Pack

- Misc bug fixes & improvements

- Fix a bug that prevent event token exchange after the event has ended
- Fix a freezing bug at loading
- Fix other misc bugs

- Resources Ads have been move to a new tab. Cooldown drastically reduced.
- Career Missions improved with new missions & rewards
- Defeating certain bosses now unlock new shiny boss packs
- Wings now add damage for all ships
- Various elites & bosses balance changes
- Misc bug fixes & improvements

- Resources Ads have been move to a new tab. Cooldown drastically reduced.
